translation: But to those who worship Me, renouncing all actions in Me, regarding Me as the supreme goal, meditating on Me with single-minded yoga.
commentary: 12.6 Ye who? You but? All of them all? Karmani actions? Mayi in Me? Sannyasya renouncing? Devoted to Me regarding Me as the supreme goal? Exclusively singleminded? Eve even? By Yoga with the Yoga? Mam Me? meditating meditating? worship worship.Commentary Ananya Yoga Unswerving Yoga exclusive? having no other objects of worship or support save the Lord Samadhi.Even in Bhakti Yoga one should not abandon actions. He must perform actions but he will have to dedicate the merits or the fruits to the Lord. (Cf.IX.27)
